botIconUrl: < url for custom bot icon. Remove or leave blank if you want to fallback to the default bot icon. *** Currently unused *** >
tz: < Timezone for notification times. See http://momentjs.com/timezone for more details. E.g. America/New_York >

schedules.day: Must be a number representing the day of week. E.g. 0 (Sunday) or 7 (Saturday)
schedules.hour: Must be a number representing the hour of the day. Military time. 0-23
schedules.minute: Must be a number representing the minute of the day. 0-59

questions: < What did you get work on... ? Note order is preserved >

members.color: A hexidecimal color that will identify each user's summary in the channel. E.g. #00FF00
